text.headline: Timeline: Andrew's Education and Career
text.text: A broad overview of my experience.</br>From my bachelor's in Mechanical Engineering, through my early Engineering career, to my pivot to a Master of Data Science.

text.headline: University of Denver
text.text:
Denver, CO

Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering

Minors of study:
  • Mathematics
  • Physics
  • Spanish language

text.headline: Norgren - IMI Precision Engineering
text.text:
Littleton, CO

Full-time gap year as Engineering Change Coordinator

text.headline: Folsom Custom Skis
text.text:
University of Denver, CO

Senior Design Project to design and manufacture a quality control workbench, for the repeatable measurement of mechanical properites of skis:
  • Stiffness
  • Damping factor
  • Dimensions

media.caption: The team at the project showcase

text.headline: Camino de Santiago
text.text: <small>Northern Spain</small></br></br>A 30 day, 500+ mile walking journey across the iberian peninsula, from the French Pyrenees, to the Spanish West coast.

text.headline: Visser Precision
text.text:
Denver, CO

Additive Engineer

Metal 3D printing engineering role that entailed:
  • CAD modeling of support structures with Solidworks
  • Operating and maintaining EOS Laser Powder Bed Fusion machines
  • Manufacturing process development
  • Materials research
Promoted to Department Manager in May, 2020 -->

media.caption: A copper benchmarking part printed for NASA

text.headline: Visser Precision
text.text:
Denver, CO

Additive Manufacturing Department Manager

Hired, trained, and lead a team of 4 employees. Managed each facet of the business pipeline for at least some time while training employees to take over:
  • Sales and customer relations
  • Job quoting and contract review
  • Procurement
  • Scheduling
  • Computer Aided Design
  • Compliance documentation

media.caption: Company logo during and after printing

text.headline: UC Berkeley School of Information
text.text:
Berkeley, CA (remote)

Master of Information and Data Science

A career pivot towards tech.
Gained proficiency in frequentist and Bayesian statistics, Python data science frameworks, and the following specialized concepts:
  • Computer vision and image classification
  • Natural language processing and generation
  • Systems engineering with Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud compute platforms (AWS, MS, GCP)
  • Data visualization on the front end (Tableau, Altair, D3.js)

media.caption: Capstone project demonstration. SkinScreen: a skin cancer classification webapp.
